typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IBufferOptions.OptionDetails memory,contract BufferIBFRPoolV2,contract OptionConfig,uint256,uint256) view returns (uint256)

currentImpliedVolatility(uint256,BufferI.notice: Calculate the Utilisation adjusted ImpliedVol for the pool according to https://www.desmos.com/calculator/xdmhn97opd

fees(uint256,uint256,uint256,IBufferOpti.notice: Used for getting the price for Options in tokenX

params.currentPrice: Current price of the underlying asset
params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.premium: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options
returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the Buffer token holders

feesBinary(uint256,uint256,uint256,bool,.notice: Used for getting the price for Binary Options

params.currentPrice: Current price of the underlying asset
params.isAbove: whether the price will stay above this strike or not
params.isYes: whether the option isAbove or not
params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.premium: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options
returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the Buffer token holders

feesKPIBinary(IBufferOptions.OptionDetai.notice: Used for getting the price for Binary KPI Options

params.optionDetails: Details of the option to be priced

returns.premium: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options
returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the Buffer token holders

feesTokenXBinary(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Used for getting the price for Binary Options

params.currentPrice: Current price of the underlying asset
params.isAbove: whether the price will stay above this strike or not
params.isYes: whether the option isAbove or not
params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.premium: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options

feesUsd(uint256,uint256,uint256,IBufferO.notice: Used for getting the price for Options in USD

params.currentPrice: Current price of the underlying asset
params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.premium: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options in USD
returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the Buffer token holders in USD
returns.total: Total price to be paid in USD
